content:
The Parade Station is as reliable as ever.
When I was little,
I often lay on my sister's desk,

If there's anything <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> wants to know,
feel free to ask me!
Watching her draw the map while listening to Parade Station together.\nIt feels like it's been so long... hit the brakes! How long has it been?

But if you want to know what's happening around the world,
and where all the rare creatures are hanging out,
you should check out the Parade Station.
